name: Into the Fire (THumbert)
description:
The Mechs came and destroyed everything. Whoever survived the war was placed into work camps.

There has been rumors of a human safe zone. 

The player has to find 5 terminals for the safe-zone coordinates. Beware the Mechs will find and kill you if you try to escape.

Controls:

WASD for movement. Shift for sprint. Space for Jump. Left Click to interact

This is a short story driven game with voice acting.  This  is a project my daughter and I made for the 7-Day Game Launch Challenge.

This is my first published game
